page.title: 06SOUTH NORMANTON 8.30_12.00pm
page.content: When we arrive at school we play in the playground until bell.We go inside and take off our coats.Then we file into class to pick up our hymn books and then go into assembly.There we sing hymns and sometimes a class performs a play.Then we come back into class for register.There are 37 children in our class.We read first and then we do some Maths or English. At playtime we go outside and play for a quarter of an hour.There are also crisps to buy if we are hungry. After break we go back into the classroom and do some more work. Usually we do some Maths or English again.There is now one and a quarter hours until dinner. When the dinner bell goes we put our books away and go outside.
